attributes.action: Create an LLR visa after 5 years so skilled workers can change jobs freely.
attributes.additional_details: Skilled workers contribute for many years but remain tied to a sponsoring employer, limiting mobility and slowing economic growth. Allowing LLR after 5 years would reduce pressure on businesses, help fill skill shortages, and keep welfare protections in place. It gives workers fair mobility without granting early settlement.
attributes.background: Introduce a new Limited Leave to Remain (LLR) status for skilled workers after 5 years, allowing them to work for any employer without sponsorship while keeping restrictions on access to public funds. ILR would still remain at 15 years.

rejection.details: Make Skilled Worker sponsor-free after 5 years, with grace period and cap fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747176
